prompt.expectations: Create some practical task for Test automation engineer on Java for checking his knowledge about collections and provide solution
prompt.examplePrompt:
Create some practical task for Test automation engineer on Java for checking his knowledge about collections and provide solution

can you complicate this task

assessment.comments: A good example to generate sample interview questions for automation engineers. This would work better if you make the AI creative as it would produce different examples every time and make it interesting.

Create some practical task for Test automation engineer on Java for checking his knowledge about collections and provide solution

can you complicate this task

2.revisedPrompt: Create a practical task for interviewing a test automation engineer using Java. Focus on testing their knowledge about collections. Provide the task's solution and make it complicated

4.revisedPrompt: Act as a senior test automation engineer. Create a practical task for interviewing a test automation engineer using Java. Focus on testing their knowledge about collections. Provide the task's solution and make it complicated
